components.name: ButtonComponent
components.templateData:
<button
  class="relative overflow-hidden px-4 py-[5px] transition-all duration-200 active:translate-y-[2px] active:shadow-[0_2px_4px_rgba(0,0,0,0.2)] "
  [class.border]="showBorder"
  [ngStyle]="{
    backgroundColor: isHovered ? hoverBGColor : bgColor,
    color: isHovered ? hoverColor : color,
    borderRadius: borderRadius + 'px',
    borderColor: borderColor,
    width: isexpand ? '100%' : 'auto'
  }"
  (mouseenter)="isHovered = true"
  (mouseleave)="isHovered = false"
  (click)="createRipple($event)"
>
  {{ text }}
</button>

components.name: LeaveManagementComponent

propertiesClass.name: designationOptions
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
[
    { name: 'Software Engineer', value: 'software_engineer' },
    { name: 'Senior Software Engineer', value: 'senior_software_engineer' },
    { name: 'Team Lead', value: 'team_lead' },
    { name: 'Project Manager', value: 'project_manager' },
    { name: 'HR Manager', value: 'hr_manager' },
    { name: 'Recruiter', value: 'recruiter' },
  ]

components.templateData:
Organization Leave Policy

Configure leave types, annual allowances, and policy rules for your organization

Standard Leave Types

Sick Leave

Leave for medical reasons, illness, or health-related issues

Casual Leave

Leave for personal work, family functions, or short-term needs

Earned Leave / Privilege Leave

Vacation leave earned based on service duration

How leave balance is credited

Parental Leave Types

Maternity Leave

Leave for female employees before and after childbirth

Paternity Leave

Leave for male employees for childbirth or adaption

Additional Leave Types

Compensatory Off (Comp-Off)

Leave earned for working on holidays or overtime

Loss of Pay(LOP) / Unpaid Leave

Leave without pay when other leave balances are exhausted

  • Include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special characters
  • Employee will be prompted to change password on first login
